Room.Name: Wedding Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the grand showroom of the Oceancrest Wedding Shop.
Room.LongDescription: This is a one-stop shop for all your wedding needs. You may leave mail here for the DM describing your coming wedding, and later you will be able to buy wedding invitations here. Be sure to specify the time, date and location of your coming marriage, and the name of your intended. You may buy a sample invitation at any time.
